content.review_content: I came to Da Nang City and staying at Paris Deli Hotel during my vacation in May. They assigned me a beautiful suite on the 6th floor with a stunning panoramic view of My Khe Beach. The room was luxury with a small kitchen & cable TV & WIFI and the bathroom was spotless.  The highlights were the fabulous breakfast buffet which kept me full throughout most of the day. The gym on the top floor is equipped with modern top of the line equipments. I used it very early in the mornings. The pool was also enjoyfully. The team there was delighted to offer dedicated service. At the pool, I read for a while and truly started to feel so relaxed.
